title: If oranges are bought at the rate of 15 oranges for 100 rupees, how many must be sold for 100 rupees so as to gain 25%? - Quora

response.answer_text: He should sell all the 15 oranges for ₹ 125 to gain 25%. Selling price of each orange is 25/3. If he sells 12 oranges he will get 12*25/3 =₹ 100 n = 1500/125 = 12
12 oranges, so, the cost of each orange increases from 6.667 to 8.333 or an increase of 25%.
